nodes.text: A sky-king was a type of aircraft trained to take down surveillance drones and other small craft. A dozen sky-kings escorted the Zerpen ship (crewed by Orson Krennic) landing on the planet of Vallt to extricate Galen Erso. Held captive at Tambolor prison on the same planet of Vallt, Erso had watched them perform "lazy spirals" overhead his prison cell before his rescue.
